Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
fix: Resolve accessibility and TypeScript linting issues

Fixed 4 terminal warnings in HomoLumen3D visualization:

1. Accessibility (index.tsx:250):
   - Added <label> with sr-only class for frequency-layer select
   - Added aria-label attribute for screen reader support
   - Ensures WCAG 2.1 compliance

2. Inline styles (index.tsx:164, 320, 413):
   - Added eslint-disable-next-line comments for dynamic colors
   - Agent toggle buttons: Dynamic agent.color values
   - Frequency labels: Dynamic frequency band colors
   - Connection bars: Hex color conversion from numeric values
   - Inline styles required for runtime-computed values

3. TypeScript config (tsconfig.app.json):
   - Enabled forceConsistentCasingInFileNames option
   - Reduces cross-OS file casing issues
   - Added to Linting section for consistency

All terminal errors resolved. Dynamic color styling preserved
with proper ESLint exception documentation.
